recipe.title: Strawberry White Wine Cooler
ingredients: a 750-ml. bottle Sauvignon Blanc or other dry white wine, chilled
instructions: In a bowl gently toss together strawberries and sugar and let stand 10 minutes. In a blender purée strawberry mixture with wine until smooth and pour through a fine sieve into a pitcher. Wine cooler may be made 4 hours ahead and chilled.
Serve wine cooler chilled over ice.
